title: PLEASE HELP! Experencing Severe Lagging Issues In-Game!!
body:
I get about 30-35 ping every game no matter who is on my connection. I only have my computer and my Console hooked up to my internet and I experience VERY BIG LAG with the game. I can't explain it but the best way to explain it is that everything freezes but I can still see my hp bar go down when I die. NOTHING IS WRONG WITH MY PING. It just lags off and on for no reason. If there is a fix or if someone knows what is happening please help. I get Leaverbuster because it is so bad to where I cant even play. 




Even though my ping says 30ms. 




https://snag.gy/vKYbRx.jpg
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: It sounds like you might be suffering from packet loss, which can still happen despite your ping.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) in this case to get an overview, and let me know what you find.
